short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you like Garfield? We invite you to try the most funniest games with Garfield where you will be able to color and dress up him.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Garfield is the most popular kitten. In these games with Garfield you will be able to meet all the characters present in the famous cartoons: Garfield (main character), Oddie (the puppy), Jon Arbuckle (the ownerof the two friends), Dr. Liz Wilson (doctor) , as well as many other characters.

In these games you will have to complete some fun activities with Garfield and his friends, such as games in which you have to look for differences in pictures/ images, or games in which you will have to dress the two cats from the game.

If you want to try other games with Garfield you will be able to choose other educational applications by accessing More Games.
